name: goalspal
overview:
Goalspal is about providing an online goal management tools. It has been developed with the premise that we all make resolutions and goals, but never really track them regularly. And sooner or later we forget all about them. When we write down the goals, and measure our progress every day, we are more likely to stick to them, and ultimately achieve them.

Features

  1. Unlimited goal creation. It can be anything one ever wanted to do – e.g, Lose weight, Read a book a week, etc..
  2. Ability to track them daily or weekly over a period of a few days, months or years.
  3. Ability to share experiences or keep the goal progress ‘diary’ private.
  4. Learn from others’ experiences when they share their goal progress diaries.
  5. A dashboard view of all the goals being worked on or already achieved.
